participant_1.background:
I spent my summer nights at the coffee shop, watching the stars.
Rita Hayworth is my idol and I like to work out to stay in shape.
i would rather read a book than watch a movie.
I love spending time with my grandpa on the weekend.
I am worried about my child's future.

participant_2.background:
I have a big personality to match my beer gut.
i almost always wear a t shirt and jeans.
I like to spend time alone, pursuing my own interests.
my weakness are sweets.
I took a lot of pictures of my daughters last year.

content.text: I'm doing great, thanks for asking. How about you?
I'm doing well, thanks for asking. I spent my summer nights at the coffee shop, watching the stars. What did you do?
I spent a lot of time with my kids last year, and I took a lot of pictures of them. I also like to spend time alone, pursuing my own interests.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I love spending time with my grandpa on the weekend. What are your interests?
I'm interested in a lot of things, but I'm especially interested in history and science. I also enjoy reading and working out.
Those are great interests! I love to read as well. What are some of your favorite books?
I love historical fiction and biographies. I also enjoy reading about science and nature. What are some of your favorite books?
I love to read anything by Stephen King, but I also enjoy reading historical fiction and mysteries.
I've never read anything by Stephen King, but I've heard good things. I'll have to check it out.
You should! He's one of my favorite authors.
I will! Thanks for the recommendation.
